verses.verse: וַיַּקְהֵ֣ל <S%H6950><s%> vai-yak-Hel together מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֲדַ֛ת <S%H5712><s%> 'a-Dat all the congregation בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem; to אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim, unto them These [are] the words אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah hath commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot that [ye] should do אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam.

שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> She-shet Six יָמִים֮ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days תֵּעָשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> te-'a-Seh be done מְלָאכָה֒ <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah shall work וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-vai-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, but on the seventh יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh shall have לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem קֹ֛דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh there shall be to you an holy day שַׁבַּ֥ת <S%H7676><s%> shab-Bat a sabbath שַׁבָּת֖וֹן <S%H7677><s%> shab-ba-Ton of rest לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; to the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- whoever הָעֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ha-'o-Seh whosoever doeth ב֛וֹ vo מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah work יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat. therein shall be put to death

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תְבַעֲר֣וּ <S%H1197><s%> te-va-'a-Ru Ye shall kindle אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh, no fire בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol any מֹשְׁבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H4186><s%> mo-she-vo-tei-Chem; throughout your habitations בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat. upon the sabbath פ Peh
